CustomField.formula: IF (ISPICKVAL( Customer_Category__c , 'Blue'), IMAGE( '/resource/blueflag', ''), IF(OR (ISPICKVAL (Customer_Category__c, "Red")), IMAGE( '/resource/redflag', ''), IF(OR (ISPICKVAL (Customer_Category__c, "Orange")), IMAGE( '/resource/orangeflag', ''), IF(OR (ISPICKVAL (Customer_Category__c, "Green")), IMAGE( '/resource/greenflag', ''), " "))))
CustomField.label: color code
